frontmatter.title: Intel, Layer5 Announce MeshMark to Quantify Cloud-Native Performance
frontmatter.author: ITPro Today
frontmatter.description: MeshMark, a metric introduced by Intel and Layer5, helps quantify and optimize cloud-native service mesh deployments. Part of CNCF's Service Mesh Performance project, MeshMark measures load latency and resource utilization, providing essential insights for enhancing cloud-native environments.
